items.name: assert
items.title: Assertion Helper
items.description: TypeScript assertion function that narrows types when condition is truthy. Throws with optional message if condition is falsy.

items.name: logger
items.title: Pino Logger
items.description: Structured JSON logger with pretty-printing in development. Configurable log level via PINO_LOG_LEVEL env var.

items.name: config-schema
items.title: Config Schema
items.description: Drizzle-like API for type-safe environment variable configuration with Zod validation, runtime protection for server-only config, and full TypeScript inference.

items.name: validate-env
items.title: Validate Environment
items.description: CLI script to validate all config.ts files against .env files. Finds missing variables, reports validation errors, and warns about unused env vars.
items.docs: Add 'env:validate': 'bun run scripts/validate-env.ts' to your package.json scripts. Run with --environment=development or --environment=production.

items.name: use-resumable-chat
items.title: Resumable Chat Hook
items.description: React hook wrapping useChat with WorkflowChatTransport for automatic stream resumption. Handles reconnection to interrupted workflow streams.
items.docs: This hook requires a ChatAgentUIMessage type definition. Update the import path to match your project structure.

items.name: durable-agent
items.title: Durable Agent
items.description: AI agent class that executes streamText in a tool loop with workflow compatibility. Supports provider options, streaming control, and step-level durability via 'use step' directive.
items.docs: This agent requires tool definitions. Update the import from './tools' to match your project's tool configuration.
